name: Boom AET334F Scripting
description:
This is Team Boom's Final Project for AET 334F Game Scripting. For this project, our intention was to create a speedrunning game based on the rocket jump mechanic from Team Fortress 2! We hope you enjoy it! If you find any huge bugs or have any recommendations for how we can improve the project please leave a comment and one of us will get back to you! 

Team Members: Lars Fyhr, Ethan Bennikutty, Samuel Schlenker, Warren Miller,  Othman Ali, Chuck Madueke

Controls:

Move with WASD

Jump with Spacebar

Fire with Left Click
